steps.title: Prep and Preheat
steps.description: Preheat the oven to 450Â°F and line two large baking sheets with parchment paper.

steps.title: Batter the Cauliflower
steps.description: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, cornstarch, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, and salt. Add the water and whisk until smooth. Add the cauliflower and stir to coat.

steps.title: Baking First Phase
steps.description: Lift the cauliflower florets out of the batter, allowing any excess batter to drip back into the bowl. Arrange in a single layer on the prepared baking sheets and bake for 10 minutes.

steps.title: Flip and Continue Baking
steps.description: Use a spatula to carefully flip the florets. Bake for another 10 minutes, swapping the pans on the oven racks.

steps.title: Sauce and Final Bake
steps.description: Remove the cauliflower from the oven and brush with some of the buffalo sauce. Bake for another 12 to 15 minutes, or until the cauliflower is dark and crisp around the edges.

steps.title: Final Touch
steps.description: Remove from the oven and brush with additional buffalo sauce. If desired, serve with vegan ranch for dipping.
